description: Manx Telecom took "all practicable steps" to fix a fault that left 7,000 offline, the industry watchdog says.
title: Manx Telecom broadband outage 'not regulatory breach'
title_page: Manx Telecom broadband outage 'not regulatory breach' - BBC News
maintext: In its ruling on the handling of the fault, which occurred on 27 August, the commission said the problem was caused by a "silent fault" within the provider's hardware systems, which took until 3 September to locate and fix.
